long_description: Even if you find something sturdy for one end of your hammock, often the other end is not quite right--Madera solves this problem beautifully! Simple in design, this hammock stand is made from the highest quality materials. Stand up the hardwood bars, pound the large stake into the ground and your ready to hang any Byer Amazonas hammock. Includes bars, rope, ground stake and hardware. Leg length when set up: 64". Legs have joiner-sleeves which breaks them down to 35" when not in use for easy transport and storage.
short_description: Even if you find something sturdy for one end of your hammock, often the other end is not quite right--Madera solves this problem beautifully!
